name: Divergence: Year Zero
description: Crafting, progression, advancement and freedom taken to an obscene extremity in Divergence: Online's modern survival prequel Divergence: Year Zero!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD or Intel Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compliant Graphics Card DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD or Intel Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Compliant Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 12 GB available space
